profile.title: AltDentifier Dashboard
profile.trustfactor_explained: AltDentifier Trust Factor is a system developed by Auxim#0001 that determines the trustworthyness of your Discord account. Trust Factor is calculated using custom formulas, that take multiple factors into account when calculating the final value. After a Trust Factor has been calculated, we check the range your Trust Factor falls into, which we display to you. These Trust Factors range from Very Untrustworthy, to Very Trustworthy. Your Trust Factor is then used to decide whether your account needs to be verified when joining an AltDentifier protected server!

premium.title: Premium Settings

guidelines.title: Customization Guidelines and Restrictions
guidelines.1: Custom messages cannot contain advertising whatsoever, with the exception of information about the server the user wants to join.
guidelines.2: Custom messages cannot contain any references to NSFW content, with the exception of indicating a server's theme or rules
guidelines.3: Custom messages cannot contain personal information from anyone.
guidelines.4: Custom messages cannot contain any form of hate speech, discrimination, racism or other obscene content.
guidelines.5: Custom messages cannot contain vulgarities, swear words or political statements.
guidelines.6: Custom background images cannot contain gore, NSFW, NSFL or other obscene content not suitable for users under the age of 18.
guidelines.7: Custom background images must be hosted on trusted domains. These include, but are not limited to, Imgur, Flickr and Discord CDN.
guidelines.8: Custom background color must not be too light, to avoid conflicts with white text.
guidelines.9: Custom background images cannot be animated in any form.
guidelines.10: Custom background images should not be too distracting for the user.
guidelines.11: Custom messages should tell the user something about your server, and why they need to verify with AltDentifier to join it.

premium.no_premium: This server does not have Premium!
premium.offers: to find out about our Premium offerings!
premium.subscription: You have a subscription to our Premium plan, and can activate Premium on this server.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.delete_confirm: When you delete your account data, you will be restricted from using our services for 48 hours. This process may take a while, do not leave the page while it is still loading! Are you sure you want to delete your personal data?
privacy.request_confirm: You can only request a data insight once per 24 hours. This process may take a while, do not leave the page before a download link appears. Make sure to save your dump!

verification.title: Verification for %s
verification.method:
Please choose a verification method!
Methods that are disabled server side are hidden. With the exception of Xbox Verification, it is not neccesary to link your account with Discord.
verification.choices: You can verify with AltDentifier using Reddit, Steam, Twitter, Overwatch, Xbox, Youtube and Captcha. The available options will depend on the server. Click the button below to continue with verification! By verifying with AltDentifier, you agree with our Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions
verification.message: %s would like to give you the following message: %s
verification.explain:
The server adminstrators have set up extra security steps on this server to combat alt accounts, spammers and raiders. Sadly, your account was marked as Suspicious by our system, or a moderator has requested to process your account.

If our system can verify your account succesfully, you will be free to engage in the server. Should your account fail to verify, {}. Administrators always have the power to override this system.

With kind regards,

The {} staff team.

actions.kick: you will be kicked from the server
actions.ban: you will be banned from the server
actions.role: you will receive a certain role
actions.nothing: the action taken will be up to the discretion of the server staff

overwatch.title: Overwatch Verification

region.title: Please choose the region you play Overwatch in!

overwatch.fail_1: Your connection to Battle.Net was not verified by Discord. Make sure a tick is visible next to your connection in Discord. Please re-link your Battle.Net account to Discord and try again, or try a different method!
overwatch.fail_2: There was a problem retrieving your Overwatch profile from the API. Please try again, or use a different method!
overwatch.fail_3: Your Overwatch profile appears to be private. We cannot fetch data from a private profile, please make your profile public or try a different method!
overwatch.fail_4: Your Overwatch account is currently not eligible for verification

setup.title: AltDentifier Setup
setup.perm_error: Warning: Permissions were not granted during invite. Failing to have proper permissions can result in a non-functioning bot. Make sure to have KICK MEMBERS, BAN MEMBERS, MANAGE ROLES, MANAGE CHANNELS, SEND MESSAGES and EMBED LINKS
setup.greeting: Thank you for inviting me to {}!
setup.start:
Press the continue button below to start the setup process
By installing AltDentifier onto your server, you agree with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
We hope you have a great experience using AltDentifier!
setup.language: Which language would you like AltDentifier to use in your server?
setup.default_role: Do you want to select a default role? This role is given to members after they complete verification
setup.logging: Would you like to enable logging?
setup.in_verification_role: Do you want to select an in verification role? This role will be given to members during verification. Be aware that roles will bypass verification levels!
setup.bot_channel: Please choose a bot channel. This channel is used for giving information on the verification process. This channel should be kept private, and is required for the bot to function!
setup.warning_channel: Please choose a warning channel. This channel is used to alert users of issues or information regarding the verification process. This channel should be visible to all non verified members, and is required for the bot to function!
setup.select_role: Select a role, or keep this value empty to set none!
setup.select_log_channel: Select a channel if logging is enabled

failed.title: Setup Failed
failed.reason: Bot Channel or Warning Channel was not set! These are mandatory for the bot to function.

success.title: Setup Complete
success.desc: Setup has been completed succesfully. You can now go to the dashboard to configure more advanced settings, or close the page.

about.title: About AltDentifier
about.desc: AltDentifier is a unique verification bot to help prevent your server from alts and raids. We feature a one-of-a-kind social media and gaming platform verification system and automatic detection for alt accounts!

authorization.allow: Do you allow %s to use your account?

banned.short: You have been banned from AltDentifier
banned.long: Your account has been banned from AltDentifier for TOS abuse! You are not allowed to use AltDentifier services.

deleted.title: Data Deleted

deleted.logged_out: You have been logged out now!

questions.4: Why do some messages not respond?
questions.6: What are Mod and Admin Roles?
questions.7: What are Bot and Warning channels and why are they required?
questions.8: Why are the permissions the bot asks for required?

answers.1: AltDentifier is a bot made to detect and verify people who might be alt accounts and spam accounts. People who are marked suspicious can automatically be asked to verify themselves with AltDentifier.
answers.2: AltDentifier works by verifying users with their Discord Connections. Users can connect third party services such as Steam and Twitter to their account. AltDentifier then uses the data from these accounts to verify the legitimacy of the account.
answers.3: Yes. AltDentifier is fully managed by the developer, and thus you will never have to install any updates, these will just go out to your server automatically.
answers.4: AltDentifier has a timeout on listening to messages. This is about 1 minute. After this, it may seem like the bot stops working, but it has actually just stopped waiting for a response.
answers.5: A Default Role in this context means a role that is given to all members in your server when they join. This role gets taken away when a user needs to verify. As of recent, you can also reverse the working, so that it acts like a verification role instead!
answers.6: These are roles you can add to the bot that give access to permissions within the bot. Fundamentally they are near identical, with the only difference being that Admins can change the bot's settings, while Mods cannot. Keep in mind that Manage Server is still required for the web dashboard!
answers.7: The bot channel is the channel where AltDentifier will inform staff of the status of people in verification. The bot needs a place to output, thus it is required. The warning channel is used to warn people when they have their DM's turned off, or optionally when they need to verify. This is required as well, as users with DM's off should still be able to verify.
answers.8: AltDentifier requires Manage Roles, to be able to apply the Default Role, or remove it. It also lets us give the timeout role, and provide our autorole functionality. Kick and Ban permissions are required because we need to be able to support those actions for members who do not respond.

incorrect_account.title: Incorrect Account
incorrect_account.desc: The account you are using to login is not the same as the account asked to verify. Server staff has been alerted of this.

index.desc: The best Discord security and checkpoint bot!

features.title: Our Features
feature_descs:
New users will receive a DM to verify quickly with our easy to user verification system supporting Steam, Reddit, Twitter, YouTube, Xbox and even Google Captcha!
Our checkpoint system will deter bots and stop alts, while letting legitimate users join your server!
AltDentifier lets you know exactly who is joining, so you can rest easy knowing users are who they claim they are. AltDentifier will even alert you if users are running a VPN!
Our powerful web panel makes it easy to invite, setup and configure the bot. Our setup is easy to understand and only takes a minute to complete!
Combine the best of anti-raid and verification bots with our automatic anti-raid. Automated accounts will not pass our verification site, while letting new members in and enjoy your server!
¿Hablas español? So do we. Our bot and website are available in English, Dutch, French, German and Spanish, so users know what they have to do with a bot that speaks their language!
Rest easy knowing all events in your server are being logged. Track message edits, deletions, leaves, bans and more!

index.invite_now: Wait no longer! Press Invite now and enjoy your server in peace, knowing it's protected!
index.endorsed: AltDentifier is not endorsed or created by Discord

tos.title: AltDentifier TOS & Privacy Policy
tos.translations: Please be aware that only our TOS in English is legally binding. While translations of these documents may be provided for your convenience, they are translated by the community and are thus not legal documents.
tos.policy:
Your privacy is very important to AltDentifier, and we will ensure protecting your privacy when using our services.

We ask for your personal information to ensure the smooth operation of AltDentifier services. AltDentifier is a social media verification platform, and as such will request and share information about your profile on these platforms with others.

When verifying your account with AltDentifier, some information may be shared with staff members of chat-groups using AltDentifier services. This includes, but is not limited to the following information:
* The total numbers of servers you are in
* A username corresponding to the service you used to verify your account
* Metrics about the account on the service you used to verify your account, these can include but are not limited to, the amount of tweets you have posted, or your Steam level.
* Your browser status, indicating whether you have used a VPN when verifying with AltDentifier.
AltDentifier stores anonymized information about the services you connect with. While this data is linked to your AltDentifier account, the identifiers of the connection are irreversibly anonymized before storage with the SHA-512 hashing algorithm.Your IP Address is processed by IPHub.info, who ensure to periodically delete the data sent by us.
AltDentifier never stores your IP Address for later use.

Furthermore, we collect analytical data for statistical and error reporting purposes, and the storing of configuration data neccesary for the operation of AltDentifier.In addition, we may employ third party integrations such as Google AdSense and Google Analytics for personalized advertisements, which uses cookie technology to provide targeted advertisements.Our automatic ad inventory is managed by https://venatusmedia.com. By using our services you agree that Venatus and their partners may place tracking cookies after your explicit consent has been given.We attempt to store your data outside of public access, in as safe a manner as we can realistically guarantee. However, due to the very nature of online data storage and transfer, we may not be able to meet this expectation, due to the fact that complete security is unobtainable.AltDentifier may be used by people not directly affiliated to us, and thus, we have no control over how they use AltDentifier, provided it is within reasonable terms.

Verification of your account with AltDentifier constitutes agreement to our policies on data collection.If you do not accept this agreement, you are to leave any chat-group using AltDentifier services, and to never verify your account with AltDentifier. Not doing so will be regarded as accepting our policies.For more information on our privacy policy, inquiries on our data usage and requesting the removal or insight of your data, including any requests made under the GDPR or DMCA, contact us at contact@altdentifier.com
tos.mumble_jumble: Please read these Terms of Service completely using https://altdentifier.com, owned and operated by Geoffrey Westhoff. This agreement documents the legally binding terms and conditions attached to  the use of the Site at altdentifier.com. By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services. The AltDentifier service is not accessible to those under 13 years of age, and AltDentifier does not knowingly store personal information from children under the age of 13. Any participation in this service will constitute acceptance of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

liability.title: Liability
liability.text: This site and it's components are offered for informational purposes only; this site shall not be responsible or liable for the accuracy, usefulness or availability of any information transmitted or made available via the site, and shall not be responsible or liable for any error or omissions in that information.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: The Site and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Geoffrey Westhoff and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws. All data generated and shared by AltDentifier in the past, present or future is property of AltDentifier and it's sole owners and must be transferred, removed or changed on request.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We may terminate your access to the Site, without cause or notice, which may result in the forfeiture and destruction of all information associated with your account. All provisions of this Agreement that, by their nature, should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. You may also request to terminate your account yourself, to do this, submit a deletion request on our web panel. Using AltDentifier after termination will result in a new account being opened for you.

changes.title: Changes to the agreement
changes.text: AltDentifier reserves the right to change these conditions from time to time as it sees fit and your continued use of the site will signify your acceptance of any adjustment to these terms.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.text: AltDentifier is provided "as is" with no warranty or liability for any outcomes of using AltDentifier and/or any content you may or may not interact with on AltDentifier, and you agree that AltDentifier is not liable for any events in the past, in current times or in the future. You agree to hold harmless against AltDentifier for every possible situation except for those we accept full responsibility off. AltDentifier is not responsible and will not take responsibility for the behaviour of other parties using AltDentifier.

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.text:
While using AltDentifier, certain situations may or may not develop which may cause you to file a dispute with us.
If you find yourself banned from our services, you must e-mail our contact mail to file an official appeals, or to request the reason for your ban. Appeals must be formally written and should include your Discord ID, proof of account ownership and a reason why your ban should be overturned.
If you wish to be forgotten by AltDentifier, you can submit a request at our web panel.
If you wish to submit a personal data request, you can submit a request at our web panel once per 24 hours.

other_links.title: Other Links
other_links.text: Our Site does contain a number of links to other websites and online resources that are not owned or controlled by AltDentifier. AltDentifier has no control over, and therefore cannot assume responsibility for, the content or general practices of any of these third party sites and/or services. Therefore, we strongly advise you to read the entire terms and conditions and privacy policy of any site that you visit as a result of following a link that is posted on our site.

law.title: Governing Law
law.text: This Agreement is governed in accordance with the laws of The Kingdom of The Netherlands.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.text: By using AltDentifier, you acknowledge all above Terms. You acknowledge that, even if you did not read the Terms in full, you will comply with our Terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions, requests or complaints about AltDentifier, please forward this to our staff using contact@altdentifier.com. We will respond to these inquiries within 28 days. AltDentifier fully complies with GDPR Data Releasements and Data Deletion.
